plays.text: Goal scored by Keith Tkachuk assisted by Jeff Finley
Goal scored by Sergei Varlamov assisted by Reed Low and Daniel Corso
Penalty to Mark Rycroft 2 minutes for Tripping Mats Sundin
Penalty to Gary Roberts 2 minutes for Interference Rich Pilon
Penalty to Keith Tkachuk 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Doug Weight 2 minutes for Holding Dmitry Yushkevich
Penalty to Cory Cross 2 minutes for Crosschecking Doug Weight
Goal scored by Pavol Demitra assisted by Rich Pilon and Keith Tkachuk
Goal scored by Travis Green assisted by Bryan McCabe and Darcy Tucker
Goal scored by Cory Stillman assisted by Mark Rycroft
Goal scored by Robert Reichel assisted by Gary Roberts
Penalty to Pavol Demitra 2 minutes for Hooking Mikael Renberg
Penalty to Gary Roberts 2 minutes for Interference Al MacInnis
Penalty to Bryan McCabe 2 minutes for Holding Keith Tkachuk
Penalty to Cory Cross 2 minutes for Roughing Cory Stillman
Penalty to Cory Stillman 2 minutes for High Sticking Cory Cross
Penalty to Gary Roberts 2 minutes for High Sticking Dallas Drake
Penalty to Keith Tkachuk 2 minutes for Slashing Darcy Tucker
Penalty to Darcy Tucker 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct Keith Tkachuk
Penalty to Mats Sundin 2 minutes for Roughing Daniel Corso
